context.title: Preview window
context.description: A window to pre-visualize Phaser related assets. Drop any asset on this view or select it and type CTRL+ALT+V.

context.title: Asset Pack Explorer
context.description: Explorer of the assets declared in the asset packs of the workspace. With a mouse hover you can preview the assets or click on them to open the asset pack editor.

context.title: JavaScript editor
context.description: The JavaScript editor allow to auto complete the Phaser API, the asset keys, the project files, the easing literals and others. With a mouse hover you can preview the asset keys or open them in the Preview window with CTRL+ALT+V.

context.title: Asset Pack editor
context.description:
The Asset Pack editor brings a visual and assisted interface to build an Asset Pack JSON manifest, which is a Phaser standard to pack assets.
We encourage to use this way to pack and load the game's assets, cause there are many other features based on this.

context.title: Audio Sprites editor
context.description: The Audio Sprites editor is a tool to join many audio files into one audio atlas. You can drag and drop the audio files into the editor to append them.

context.title: Chains: search on the Phaser doc
context.description:
Chains is a tool to search on the Phaser API and Phaser official examples. You write an expression like "game*down" and it shows all matching API (method chains) and examples.
You can see the JSDoc of the matchig methods or see the whole code of the matching examples.
This is a great tool to discover and learn the Phaser API and concepts.

topic.label: Chains: search on the Phaser doc

context.title: Texture Atlas editor
context.description: This is a tool to create texture atlases. Drag and drop images into the editor to add new sprites. You can tune the packing algorithm by opening the settings dialog.
